channel.title: CVE Feed for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. / Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- V-SFT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. / Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- V-SFT

item.title: CVE-2022-29506|2024-08-03T06:26:06.231Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20%2F%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-sft
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exist in the simulator module contained in the graphic editor 'V-SFT' v6.1.3.0 and earlier, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.

item.title: CVE-2022-29522|2024-08-03T06:26:06.350Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20%2F%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-sft
item.description: Use after free vulnerability exists in the simulator module contained in the graphic editor 'V-SFT' versions prior to v6.1.6.0, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.

item.title: CVE-2022-29925|2024-08-03T06:33:43.328Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20%2F%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-sft
item.description: Access of uninitialized pointer vulnerability exists in the simulator module contained in the graphic editor 'V-SFT' versions prior to v6.1.6.0, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.

item.title: CVE-2022-26302|2024-08-03T04:56:37.894Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20%2F%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-sft
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow exists in the simulator module contained in the graphic editor 'V-SFT' versions prior to v6.1.6.0, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.

item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the simulator module contained in the graphic editor 'V-SFT' versions prior to v6.1.6.0, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.

item.title: CVE-2022-30538|2024-08-03T06:48:36.458Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20%2F%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-sft
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the simulator module contained in the graphic editor 'V-SFT' versions prior to v6.1.6.0, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.
